mapper.insert: insert into service (seid, pvid, sedescription, seprice, seavailablity, seavailable_time, scname) VALUES (#{seid},#{pvid},#{sedescription},#{seprice},#{seavailablity},#{seavailable_time},#{scname})
mapper.update: update service set seid=#{seid}, pvid=#{pvid}, sedescription=#{sedescription}, seprice=#{seprice}, seavailablity=#{seavailablity}, seavailable_time=#{seavailable_time}, scname=#{scname}, where seid = #{seid}
